item.title: Report E-2024070675
item.description:
Report E-2024070675

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-31T18:16:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-29
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 40-ounces of DTM Primer Activator was released from two 20-ounce DM due to a puncture. The release impacted the dock floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they feel comfortable that terminal personnel can clean the release with PPE available on-site.
